nodes.text: Samana spiced loaf was a type of bread found on the agriworld Sedri Minor. The parents of the missing child Julus offered a fresh-baked loaf to Jedi Knight Keeve Trennis, who had come to the planet investigating the disappearance of a fellow Jedi. As Trennis had just turned down an offer of bucco bread, she was bemused by another offer of food.
In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Samana was estsblished to be a city on the planet Rodia.
